testsuite.name: clients.ClientNameFieldTest
testsuite.system-out: Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_clientNamePlaceholder Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Client Name field Placeholder text in the Clients Add screen" Client Name* text is displayed in the Client Name field TC_clientNamePlaceholder Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_clientNameSpecialChar Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Clients Add screen Client Name field for the Special characters" Performed click action on Client Name field Entered text ";$'!" in the Client Name field Special characters are allowed in the Client Name text field TC_clientNameSpecialChar Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_clientNameAlphanumeric Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Clients Add screen Client Name field for the Alphabetic characters" Performed click action on Client Name field Entered text "MDhGa" in the Client Name field Alphanumeric characters are allowed in the Client Name text field TC_clientNameAlphanumeric Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_clientNameMinimumLength Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Clients Add screen Client Name field for the minimum character length" Performed click action on Client Name field Entered text "qtY" in the Client Name field Must be greater than 3 characters error message is displayed TC_clientNameMinimumLength Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_clientNameEmpty Testcase execution Started "This method verifies error message for the empty Client Name in the Clients Add screen" Performed click action on Client Name field Entered text "" in the Client Name field Required error message is displayed TC_clientNameEmpty Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_clientNameMaximumLength Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Clients Add screen Client Name field for the maximum character length" Performed click action on Client Name field Entered text "wlGpJhiQgURsqCFcvSFFdhSTcOJruQqXvtUzpKWYBRDNeSGNfPM" in the Client Name field Must not exceed 50 characters error message is displayed TC_clientNameMaximumLength Testcase execution Completed
